title: Dimensional Analysis
alt: Or the pressure at the Earth's core will rise slightly.
transcript:
My Hobby:
Abusing dimensional analysis[On a blackboard.]
(Planck energy/Pressure at the Earth's core) x (Prius combined EPA gas mileage/Minimum width of the English Channel) = Ï€[Cueball indicates this equation with a pointer in front of a class.]
Cueball: It's correct to within experimental error, and the units check out. It must be a fundamental law.
Student: But what if they build a better Prius?
Cueball: Then England will drift out to sea.
